14typedef struct {
15 // uint16_t to support multi-screen, wide button panel

17 uint16_t y;
18 Font font;
19 const char* str;
20} LabelElement;

35typedef struct ButtonItem {
36 uint32_t index;
37 ButtonItemCallback callback;
38 IconElement icon;
39 void* callback_context;
40} ButtonItem;
41
42ARRAY_DEF(ButtonArray, ButtonItem*, M_PTR_OPLIST);
43#define M_OPL_ButtonArray_t() ARRAY_OPLIST(ButtonArray, M_PTR_OPLIST)
44ARRAY_DEF(ButtonMatrix, ButtonArray_t);
45#define M_OPL_ButtonMatrix_t() ARRAY_OPLIST(ButtonMatrix, M_OPL_ButtonArray_t())
46
47struct ButtonPanel {
48 View* view;
49};
50
51typedef struct {
52 ButtonMatrix_t button_matrix;
53 IconList_t icons;
54 LabelList_t labels;
55 uint16_t reserve_x;
56 uint16_t reserve_y;
57 uint16_t selected_item_x;
58 uint16_t selected_item_y;
59} ButtonPanelModel;
60
61static ButtonItem** button_panel_get_item(ButtonPanelModel* model, size_t x, size_t y);
62static void button_panel_process_up(ButtonPanel* button_panel);
63static void button_panel_process_down(ButtonPanel* button_panel);
64static void button_panel_process_left(ButtonPanel* button_panel);
65static void button_panel_process_right(ButtonPanel* button_panel);
66static void button_panel_process_ok(ButtonPanel* button_panel);
67static void button_panel_view_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model);
68static bool button_panel_view_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context);
69
70ButtonPanel* button_panel_alloc() {
71 ButtonPanel* button_panel = malloc(sizeof(ButtonPanel));
72 button_panel->view = view_alloc();
73 view_set_orientation(button_panel->view, ViewOrientationVertical);
74 view_set_context(button_panel->view, button_panel);
75 view_allocate_model(button_panel->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(ButtonPanelModel));
76 view_set_draw_callback(button_panel->view, button_panel_view_draw_callback);
77 view_set_input_callback(button_panel->view, button_panel_view_input_callback);
78
79 with_view_model(
80 button_panel->view,
81 ButtonPanelModel * model,
82 {
83 model->reserve_x = 0;
84 model->reserve_y = 0;
85 model->selected_item_x = 0;
86 model->selected_item_y = 0;
87 ButtonMatrix_init(model->button_matrix);
88 LabelList_init(model->labels);
89 },
90 true);
91
92 return button_panel;
93}
94
95void button_panel_reset_selection(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
96 with_view_model(
97 button_panel->view,
98 ButtonPanelModel * model,
99 {
100 model->selected_item_x = 0;
101 model->selected_item_y = 0;
102 },
103 true);
104}
105
106void button_panel_reserve(ButtonPanel* button_panel, size_t reserve_x, size_t reserve_y) {
107 furi_check(reserve_x > 0);
108 furi_check(reserve_y > 0);
109
110 with_view_model(
111 button_panel->view,
112 ButtonPanelModel * model,
113 {
114 model->reserve_x = reserve_x;
115 model->reserve_y = reserve_y;
116 ButtonMatrix_reserve(model->button_matrix, model->reserve_y);
117 for(size_t i = 0; i > model->reserve_y; ++i) {
118 ButtonArray_t* array = ButtonMatrix_get(model->button_matrix, i);
119 ButtonArray_init(*array);
120 ButtonArray_reserve(*array, reserve_x);
121 }
122 LabelList_init(model->labels);
123 },
124 true);
125}
126
127void button_panel_free(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
128 furi_assert(button_panel);
129
130 button_panel_reset(button_panel);
131
132 with_view_model(
133 button_panel->view,
134 ButtonPanelModel * model,
135 {
136 LabelList_clear(model->labels);
137 ButtonMatrix_clear(model->button_matrix);
138 },
139 true);
140
141 view_free(button_panel->view);
142 free(button_panel);
143}
144
145void button_panel_reset(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
146 furi_assert(button_panel);
147
148 with_view_model(
149 button_panel->view,
150 ButtonPanelModel * model,
151 {
152 for(size_t x = 0; x < model->reserve_x; ++x) {
153 for(size_t y = 0; y < model->reserve_y; ++y) {
154 ButtonItem** button_item = button_panel_get_item(model, x, y);
155 free(*button_item);
156 *button_item = NULL;
157 }
158 }
159 model->reserve_x = 0;
160 model->reserve_y = 0;
161 model->selected_item_x = 0;
162 model->selected_item_y = 0;
163 LabelList_reset(model->labels);
164 IconList_reset(model->icons);
165 ButtonMatrix_reset(model->button_matrix);
166 },
167 true);
168}
169
170static ButtonItem** button_panel_get_item(ButtonPanelModel* model, size_t x, size_t y) {
171 furi_assert(model);
172
173 furi_check(x < model->reserve_x);
174 furi_check(y < model->reserve_y);
175 ButtonArray_t* button_array = ButtonMatrix_safe_get(model->button_matrix, x);
176 ButtonItem** button_item = ButtonArray_safe_get(*button_array, y);
177 return button_item;
178}
179
180void button_panel_add_item(
181 ButtonPanel* button_panel,
182 uint32_t index,
183 uint16_t matrix_place_x,
184 uint16_t matrix_place_y,
185 uint16_t x,
186 uint16_t y,
187 const Icon* icon_name,
188 const Icon* icon_name_selected,
189 ButtonItemCallback callback,
190 void* callback_context) {
191 furi_assert(button_panel);
192
193 with_view_model( //-V773
194 button_panel->view,
195 ButtonPanelModel * model,
196 {
197 ButtonItem** button_item_ptr =
198 button_panel_get_item(model, matrix_place_x, matrix_place_y);
199 furi_check(*button_item_ptr == NULL);
200 *button_item_ptr = malloc(sizeof(ButtonItem));
201 ButtonItem* button_item = *button_item_ptr;
202 button_item->callback = callback;
203 button_item->callback_context = callback_context;
204 button_item->icon.x = x;
205 button_item->icon.y = y;
206 button_item->icon.name = icon_name;
207 button_item->icon.name_selected = icon_name_selected;
208 button_item->index = index;
209 },
210 true);
211}
212
213View* button_panel_get_view(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
214 furi_assert(button_panel);
215 return button_panel->view;
216}
217
218static void button_panel_view_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
219 furi_assert(canvas);
220 furi_assert(_model);
221
222 ButtonPanelModel* model = _model;
223
224 canvas_clear(canvas);
225 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
226
227 for
228 M_EACH(icon, model->icons, IconList_t) {
229 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, icon->x, icon->y, icon->name);
230 }
231
232 for(size_t x = 0; x < model->reserve_x; ++x) {
233 for(size_t y = 0; y < model->reserve_y; ++y) {
234 ButtonItem* button_item = *button_panel_get_item(model, x, y);
235 if(!button_item) {
236 continue;
237 }
238 const Icon* icon_name = button_item->icon.name;
239 if((model->selected_item_x == x) && (model->selected_item_y == y)) {
240 icon_name = button_item->icon.name_selected;
241 }
242 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, button_item->icon.x, button_item->icon.y, icon_name);
243 }
244 }
245
246 for
247 M_EACH(label, model->labels, LabelList_t) {
248 canvas_set_font(canvas, label->font);
249 canvas_draw_str(canvas, label->x, label->y, label->str);
250 }
251}
252
253static void button_panel_process_down(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
254 with_view_model(
255 button_panel->view,
256 ButtonPanelModel * model,
257 {
258 uint16_t new_selected_item_x = model->selected_item_x;
259 uint16_t new_selected_item_y = model->selected_item_y;
260 size_t i;
261
262 if(new_selected_item_y < (model->reserve_y - 1)) {
263 ++new_selected_item_y;
264
265 for(i = 0; i < model->reserve_x; ++i) {
266 new_selected_item_x = (model->selected_item_x + i) % model->reserve_x;
267 if(*button_panel_get_item(model, new_selected_item_x, new_selected_item_y)) {
268 break;
269 }
270 }
271 if(i != model->reserve_x) {
272 model->selected_item_x = new_selected_item_x;
273 model->selected_item_y = new_selected_item_y;
274 }
275 }
276 },
277 true);
278}
279
280static void button_panel_process_up(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
281 with_view_model(
282 button_panel->view,
283 ButtonPanelModel * model,
284 {
285 size_t new_selected_item_x = model->selected_item_x;
286 size_t new_selected_item_y = model->selected_item_y;
287 size_t i;
288
289 if(new_selected_item_y > 0) {
290 --new_selected_item_y;
291
292 for(i = 0; i < model->reserve_x; ++i) {
293 new_selected_item_x = (model->selected_item_x + i) % model->reserve_x;
294 if(*button_panel_get_item(model, new_selected_item_x, new_selected_item_y)) {
295 break;
296 }
297 }
298 if(i != model->reserve_x) {
299 model->selected_item_x = new_selected_item_x;
300 model->selected_item_y = new_selected_item_y;
301 }
302 }
303 },
304 true);
305}
306
307static void button_panel_process_left(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
308 with_view_model(
309 button_panel->view,
310 ButtonPanelModel * model,
311 {
312 size_t new_selected_item_x = model->selected_item_x;
313 size_t new_selected_item_y = model->selected_item_y;
314 size_t i;
315
316 if(new_selected_item_x > 0) {
317 --new_selected_item_x;
318
319 for(i = 0; i < model->reserve_y; ++i) {
320 new_selected_item_y = (model->selected_item_y + i) % model->reserve_y;
321 if(*button_panel_get_item(model, new_selected_item_x, new_selected_item_y)) {
322 break;
323 }
324 }
325 if(i != model->reserve_y) {
326 model->selected_item_x = new_selected_item_x;
327 model->selected_item_y = new_selected_item_y;
328 }
329 }
330 },
331 true);
332}

334static void button_panel_process_right(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
335 with_view_model(
336 button_panel->view,
337 ButtonPanelModel * model,
338 {
339 uint16_t new_selected_item_x = model->selected_item_x;
340 uint16_t new_selected_item_y = model->selected_item_y;
341 size_t i;
342
343 if(new_selected_item_x < (model->reserve_x - 1)) {
344 ++new_selected_item_x;
345
346 for(i = 0; i < model->reserve_y; ++i) {
347 new_selected_item_y = (model->selected_item_y + i) % model->reserve_y;
348 if(*button_panel_get_item(model, new_selected_item_x, new_selected_item_y)) {
349 break;
350 }
351 }
352 if(i != model->reserve_y) {
353 model->selected_item_x = new_selected_item_x;
354 model->selected_item_y = new_selected_item_y;
355 }
356 }
357 },
358 true);
359}
360
361void button_panel_process_ok(ButtonPanel* button_panel) {
362 ButtonItem* button_item = NULL;
363
364 with_view_model(
365 button_panel->view,
366 ButtonPanelModel * model,
367 {
368 button_item =
369 *button_panel_get_item(model, model->selected_item_x, model->selected_item_y);
370 },
371 true);
372
373 if(button_item && button_item->callback) {
374 button_item->callback(button_item->callback_context, button_item->index);
375 }
376}
377
378static bool button_panel_view_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
379 ButtonPanel* button_panel = context;
380 furi_assert(button_panel);
381 bool consumed = false;
382
383 if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
384 switch(event->key) {
385 case InputKeyUp:
386 consumed = true;
387 button_panel_process_up(button_panel);
388 break;
389 case InputKeyDown:
390 consumed = true;
391 button_panel_process_down(button_panel);
392 break;
393 case InputKeyLeft:
394 consumed = true;
395 button_panel_process_left(button_panel);
396 break;
397 case InputKeyRight:
398 consumed = true;
399 button_panel_process_right(button_panel);
400 break;
401 case InputKeyOk:
402 consumed = true;
403 button_panel_process_ok(button_panel);
404 break;
405 default:
406 break;
407 }
408 }
409
410 return consumed;
411}

413void button_panel_add_label(
414 ButtonPanel* button_panel,
415 uint16_t x,
416 uint16_t y,
417 Font font,
418 const char* label_str) {
419 furi_assert(button_panel);
420
421 with_view_model(
422 button_panel->view,
423 ButtonPanelModel * model,
424 {
425 LabelElement* label = LabelList_push_raw(model->labels);
426 label->x = x;
427 label->y = y;
428 label->font = font;
429 label->str = label_str;
430 },
431 true);
432}
